title: Musical Poster
description: This poster is an interactive artwork that facilitates collaboration across creator and performer. Touch-sensitive graphic elements serve as an interface to control audio generated by onboard electronics. Two knobs provide additional pitch and amplitude controls. Here, the poster is demoed by Andre Allen Anjos from RAC, the Remix Artist Collective. Collaboration with Karen Oliveros in 72U.

captions.4: Onboard electronics include a CAP1188, Teensy, and audio card.
